SEARCH
Module mk.musiclibrarygui
Package mk.musiclibrarygui.controllers

Class MusicTableController

java.lang.Object
mk.musiclibrarygui.controllers.MusicTableController
public class MusicTableController extends Object
Controller class for managing the music table, allowing users to add, edit, and remove songs from the music library.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Michal Kaminski

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicTableController

      public MusicTableController(SongList songList, App app)
      Constructs a MusicTableController with the specified song list and application instance. This controller manages the music table view, displaying the list of songs in a structured format and allowing user interaction with individual song entries.
      Parameters:
      songList - The SongList instance containing all songs to be displayed in the table view
      app - The main App instance that controls the application's navigation and lifecycle

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws WrongInputException
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been processed. This method sets up the table, makes columns editable, and binds key events.
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if there are issues with input data

    • makeColumnsEditable

      private void makeColumnsEditable() throws WrongInputException
      Makes the columns in the table editable and defines the behavior for committing edits.
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if there are issues with input data

    • showErrorDialog

      private void showErrorDialog(String message)
      Displays an error dialog with the specified message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display in the error dialog

    • addNewSong

      private void addNewSong(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action of adding a new song when the corresponding button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the button
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue loading the AddSongScreen

    • removeSelectedSong

      private void removeSelectedSong() throws WrongInputException
      Removes the selected song from the table.
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if there is an issue with the input

    • removeSong

      private void removeSong() throws WrongInputException
      Removes a song from the song list based on the selected index in the table.
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if there is an issue with the input

    • goBack

      private void goBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action of going back to the previous screen when the button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the button
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue loading the Menu screen

    • handleAddSongEvent

      private void handleAddSongEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles keyboard events to add a new song when Ctrl+A is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by the keyboard

    • handleGoBackEvent

      private void handleGoBackEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles keyboard events to go back when Ctrl+E is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by the keyboard

    • handleRemoveSongEvent

      private void handleRemoveSongEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event) throws WrongInputException
      Handles keyboard events to remove a selected song when the Delete key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by the keyboard
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if there is an issue with the input

    • handleTableExitEvent

      private void handleTableExitEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles keyboard events to exit the table when the Escape key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event triggered by the keyboard
